title: New York Taste 2019
text:
New York Taste is New York magazine’s signature culinary tasting event that features more than 40 celebrated chefs, mixologists and rising stars on the New York City restaurant scene. New York and Grub Street’s editors and critics curate a list of the city’s top restaurants and bars. Drawing from the popular editorial columns the Absolute Best, Where to Eat, and The Thousand Best, New York Taste helps provide guests with an authentic and diverse taste of the city.

For more information and the full line-up of chefs and restaurants, visit taste.nymag.com.





GENERAL ADMISSION TICKETS

Ticket price: $130 + tax

Time: 7:00 - 9:00 PM

Includes:

Unlimited tastings from 40+ restaurants, chefs and mixologists



Open Bar





VIP TICKETS

Ticket Price: $230 + tax



Time: 6:00 - 9:00 PM

Includes:

Tasting Preview hour (6-7pm) , one hour prior to General Admission doors opening (7-9pm)

Unlimited tastings from 40+ restaurants, chefs, and mixologists, plus exclusive tastings in the VIP lounge

Access to the VIP Lounge including a private open bar and seating

Exclusive gift bag (valued at $200+)





*All ticket sales are final. No refunds, no exchanges permitted.
description: Eventbrite - New York Magazine presents New York Taste 2019 - Monday, October 21, 2019 at The Waterfront, New York. Find event and ticket information.
